title: 7 In 1 Elixir - Nail Treatment; Non-Toxic, Vegan, and Cruelty-Free (#19628)
description: Extraordinary Compound of Oils, Vitamins and Minerals all working together to make nails Strong and Hard, Smooth and Shiny, Healthy and Hydrated. Instructions for Use: * As a Treatment: Apply two coats, twice a week to increase the benefits. * As a Base Coat: Apply one coat under your favorite Karma Organic Nail Polish
cleaned_text: Extraordinary Compound of Oils, Vitamins and Minerals all working together to make nails Strong and Hard, Smooth and Shiny, Healthy and Hydrated. Instructions for Use: * As a Treatment: Apply two coats, twice a week to increase the benefits. * As a Base Coat: Apply one coat under your favorite Karma Organic Nail Polish.
